SEARCH

Package gutek.gui.controllers

package gutek.gui.controllers
This package contains all JavaFX controllers used in the application.
  • FXMLController - The base class for all controllers in this package.
  • A main class representing the primary Stage, which manages and sets specific views by applying Scenes based on defined controllers.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    gutek.gui
    This package contains the main graphical user interface (GUI) components, organized into several sub-packages: controllers - Controllers for handling various JavaFX controls, including: Controllers for ListView JavaFX controls. Controllers for managing decks. Controllers used during application initialization. Main view controllers. Controllers for menu components: the main menu bar and deck management menus. A primary class for storing the main Stage and loading specific Scenes. controls - JavaFX controls used across the application.
    gutek.gui.controllers.controls
    This package contains controllers for managing custom controls related to ListView cells within the application.
    gutek.gui.controllers.deck
    This package contains controllers for managing and handling decks within the application.
    gutek.gui.controllers.launch
    This package contains controllers responsible for handling the application's launch and initialization processes.
    gutek.gui.controllers.main
    This package contains the main controllers for the primary views of the application.
    gutek.gui.controllers.menu
    This package contains controllers for the menus used in the application.
  • Class
    Description
    FXMLController
    The `FXMLController` class serves as an abstract base class for all FXML controllers in the application.
    MainStage
    Main application stage that manages the display of views and the application menu.
    MainStageScenes
    Enum representing different JavaFX scenes in the main application stage.
